name: Sapphire Jelly
description: The Sapphire Jelly is a gelatinous creature that can absorb significant damage and exhibits a freezing capability. It moves with a slimy form and can engulf its foes.
memorable: Its ability to transform slain humanoids into glacial corrupters adds a unique layer of danger to encounters.
goals: Typically seeks to engulf and freeze targets.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other oozes or cold-themed creatures.
environment: Often found in cold or icy environments.
strengths: Impressive Constitution grants it resistance to various conditions and cold damage immunity.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it less capable of dodging attacks.
attacks: Utilizes Freezing Slam attacks that hit with bludgeoning and cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: Icy Transformation that turns slain humanoids into glacial corrupters after a week.
senses: Possesses blindsight within 60 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings without sight.
additional_information: Immunities to cold and poison damage.
Can move through narrow spaces easily.
Has a passive Perception score of 11.
Engulfs creatures, causing cold damage and restraining them.
Multiattack feature allows for significant damage output.
test_queries: formed of jelly and transforms foes into corrupters
cold immune ooze with high hit points
multiattack ooze creature with freezing abilities
monster that engulfs and restrains adventurers
